translation.en: ♪ We can bring our worlds together ♪
♪ Not quite ocean, not quite land ♪
translation.it: A metà tra terra e mare

translation.en: ♪ So I go with the flow And I know who I am ♪
translation.it: Per sapere chi sono dovrò cercare

translation.en: ♪ Not quite ocean, not quite land ♪
translation.it: A metà tra terra e mare

translation.en: ♪ So I go with the flow And I know who I am ♪
translation.it: Per sapere chi sono dovrò cercare

translation.en: then you go and I go, and then: Ta-da!
translation.it: poi tu vai, io vado, e poi:

translation.en: -You make a great dance partner, Pixie. -You too.
translation.it: - Sei un'ottima partner, Pixie. - Anche tu.

translation.en: Last one to the stream is a rotten fluffernut.
translation.it: L'ultimo al ruscello è una noce arcobaleno!

translation.en: I just love it when the wind blows through my mane.
Kelp, I just figured out something really, really, really,
translation.it: Kelp, ho appena capito una cosa davvero, davvero, davvero,

translation.en: and drinking from the stream and warm breezes.
translation.it: bere dal ruscello, e la calda brezza.

translation.en: That means something big, don't you think?
-What do I think? -It means we're not just friends.
translation.it: - Cosa dici? - Che non siamo solo amici.

translation.en: And as best friends, we need...
translation.it: E come migliori amici, ci servono...
addobbi da corno da migliori amici!

translation.en: One for you and one for me.
translation.it: Uno per te e uno per me.

translation.en: I like this look. Thank you, Pixie.
translation.it: Mi piace il look. Grazie, Pixie.

translation.en: Now come on. I have something to show you.
It's actually why I brought you here.
translation.it: È il motivo per cui ti ho portato qui.
- Ma non hai invitato tutti qui? - Sì.

translation.en: I wanted you to be the first to see.
translation.it: Cosicché fossi il primo a vederle.

translation.en: I could watch these all day.
I knew you would. Jump on one.
translation.it: Lo sapevo. Salta su una nube.

translation.en: But the fun is staying on the cloud.
Why do you keep hopping off?
Well, I guess because I don't really like riding on them.
translation.it: Beh, forse è perché non mi piace tanto, cavalcarle.

translation.en: I don't like going that fast. And the bumps? Not for me.
translation.it: Non mi piace andare veloce. E lo scontro? No.

translation.en: I love riding on the clouds.
That's great. Then hop back on.
I like watching the clouds. And look.
translation.it: A me piace guardare le nubi. E...

translation.en: Maybe they can ride with you, and I can watch.
translation.it: Magari verranno con te, e io vi guardo.

translation.en: What do you think about that idea, Pixie? Pixie?
translation.it: Cosa te ne pare dell'idea, Pixie? Pixie?

translation.en: I think I don't want to play anymore.
translation.it: Non penso di voler giocare più.

translation.en: Kelp, where's Pixie's going? She said she had a surprise to show us.
translation.it: Kelp, dove va Pixie? Aveva parlato di una sorpresa.

translation.en: Knowing Pixie, it's gonna be really good.
Is it tacos? I hope it's tacos.
-Do you know what it is, Kelp? -Mm-hm.
Sad Kelp? That's not a good surprise.
translation.it: Kelp triste? Non è una bella sorpresa.

translation.en: Pixie actually had a really good surprise.
And I know she really wanted to show you all,
but she just ran off, and I don't know why.
translation.it: ma è scappata, e non so perché.

translation.en: Let's ask her. Where did she go?
I don't know, but we should find her and make sure she's okay.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma troviamola per vedere se sta bene.

translation.en: -Okay. Let's go. -We'll check all her favorite places.
translation.it: - Su. - Guardiamo i suoi posti preferiti.

translation.en: He was supposed to like the fun clouds because I like the fun clouds.
translation.it: Dovevano piacergli le nubi divertenti perché piacciono a me.

translation.en: I can tell you're best friends because you like to walk the same.
translation.it: Siete migliori amici perché camminate uguale.

translation.en: I don't think she's in the log.
Well, it's official. She's not at the market.
translation.it: È ufficiale. Non è al mercato.

translation.en: I still don't know why she ran off like that.
It is strange. Did anything happen before she ran off?
translation.it: È strano. È successo qualcosa, prima che scappasse?

translation.en: Well, first I made my bed, cleaned my room, danced a little,
translation.it: Ho rifatto il letto, pulito la stanza, ballato un po',

translation.en: had squid-ink pancakes for breakfast, then I--

translation.it: Va bene. Magari non tutto tutto.

translation.en: Remember when we used to drink from the stream together?
I used to have a best friend like that.
Aw. You're on his face right now.
Uh... I don't think she's in the hole.
You know, I don't either anymore,
but it does feel good to dig.
you two shared your love of dancing, drinking from streams,
translation.it: avete detto che vi piace ballare, bere,

translation.en: Yep. Then she showed me the fun clouds.
translation.it: Sì. Poi mi ha mostrato le nubi divertenti.

translation.en: She had a lot of fun riding around on them.
But if she suddenly ran off, something must have upset her.
translation.it: E poi è scappata. Qualcosa l'avrà intristita.

translation.en: -The good news is that she was here. -Yeah.
We need to keep checking in her favorite places.
Keep doing everything together, little frogs.
Don't lose your best friend, like I did.
translation.it: Non perdetevi il migliore amico, come ho fatto io.

translation.en: I'm thinking about Kelp so much it's like I can hear him.
translation.it: Penso così tanto a Kelp, che quasi lo sento.

translation.en: I knew she'd be at the blindersploot tree.
translation.it: Sapevo che era all'albero dei baccelli marini!

translation.en: Hey, Juni. Why don't we hang back?
Of course I did. You're my best friend.
translation.it: Certo. Sei la mia migliore amica.

translation.en: I was sad that we couldn't be best friends anymore.
translation.it: Ero triste perché non eravamo più migliori amici.

translation.en: Why can't we be best friends anymore?
translation.it: E perché non lo siamo più?

translation.en: I'm looking, but I don't get it.
Best friends are supposed to do and like all the same things.
translation.it: I migliori amici fanno e adorano le stesse cose.

translation.en: Look at the way these frogs hop the same.
I loved the fun clouds, but you didn't like them at all.
translation.it: Io ho adorato le nubi divertenti, ma tu no.

translation.en: So we can't be best friends.
translation.it: Quindi non possiamo essere migliori amici.

translation.en: Really? I'm not sure that's true.
translation.it: Davvero? Non credo che sia vero.

translation.en: Huh. One liked splashing in the water, the other one didn't.
translation.it: A una piace saltare nell'acqua, all'altra no.

translation.en: I think we are best friends like the frogs. You know how I know?
translation.it: Siamo migliori amici come le rane. Sai perché?

translation.en: Because we had so much fun today.
And when you ran off, I was worried and I missed you.
translation.it: e quando sei scappata mi sei mancata tanto.

translation.en: And it's because we're so different that we became friends in the first place.
translation.it: Ed è perché siamo diversi che siamo diventati migliori amici.

translation.en: Yeah. If I had been just like you,
translation.it: Sì. Se fossi stato come te,

translation.en: then you wouldn't have had to teach me about being a unicorn.
translation.it: non avresti dovuto insegnarmi a essere un unicorno.

translation.en: Maybe it's even a good thing that we're a little different?
translation.it: Forse è un bene che siamo diversi?

translation.en: And we can still be best friends?
I took off my horn topper.
-Thank you, Kelp. -What are best friends for?
-Five, six, seven, eight. -Five, six, seven, eight.
translation.it: - Cinque, sei, sette, otto! - Cinque, sei, sette, otto!

translation.en: Here we are in my sunny spot.
Feel the warm sun on your back.
Ollie, can I breathe out now?
That's why it's always so special when I see it.
translation.it: Ecco perché è speciale, quando la vedo.

translation.en: Oh! Look, it sprays water too.
That's not a floating white rock. That's the White Whale.
translation.it: Non è una roccia bianca. È la Balena Bianca.

translation.en: [Kelp] Yeah. The White Whale is my friend.
translation.it: Sì. La Balena Bianca è mia amica.

translation.en: They come by once a year on their way to warmer waters.
translation.it: Passano una volta l'anno, verso le acque calde.
La mia roccia è una balena.

translation.en: There must be so much magic under the sea, and I don't know any of it.
translation.it: Dev'esserci tanta magia nel mare, e non la conosco.

translation.en: I agree. The sea is magical.
translation.it: È vero. Il mare è magico.

translation.en: And the White Whale is the best.
translation.it: E la Balena Bianca è fantastica.

translation.en: We always throw a party and cheer as they swim past.
But the White Whale's there, and you're here.
translation.it: Ma la Balena Bianca è là, e tu sei qui.

translation.en: Oh, no. You'll miss the whole thing.
translation.it: Oh, no. Ti perderai la festa.

translation.en: Nah, they're still pretty far away.
That's why they look so small.
but they're as big as maybe a hundred of these clouds.
translation.it: ma è grande forse come cento di queste nubi.

translation.en: It would be such a dream to see the White Whale up close like that.
translation.it: Sarebbe un sogno vedere la Balena Bianca da vicino.

translation.en: Imagine, I might even be able to reach out and shake their fin.
translation.it: Magari potrei anche sporgermi e stringere la sua pinna.

translation.en: But we all know that could never happen.
translation.it: Ma sappiamo che non accadrà mai.

translation.en: Why could what never happen, I said?
Why can't Ollie come underwater with me and meet the White Whale?
translation.it: Perché Ollie non può venire a conoscere la Balena Bianca?

translation.en: [Kelp] I'm a unicorn. I go underwater.
translation.it: Io sono un unicorno. E vado sott'acqua.

translation.en: [Ollie] Do you really think I could?
But before we met him, unicorns didn't even go out in the rain.
translation.it: Ma prima di conoscerlo, noi non andavamo nemmeno sotto la pioggia.

translation.en: What about breathing? How are you gonna breathe underwater?
Oh, right. That whole breathing thing.
translation.it: Oh, giusto. La faccenda del respirare.

translation.en: I can make you a bubble, for your head.
translation.it: Posso farti una bolla per la testa.

translation.en: Yeah, Kelp can make me a bubble.
translation.it: Sì! Kelp può farmi una bolla.

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm here to help however I can.
translation.it: Beh, io sono qui per aiutare come posso.

translation.en: But before we all help, what's the White Whale?
translation.it: Ma prima di aiutarvi, cos'è la Balena Bianca?

translation.en: I see a white dot or something.
translation.it: Io vedo un punto bianco o poco più.

translation.en: You wanna go under the sea to meet a white dot?
translation.it: Vuoi andare a conoscere un punto bianco?

translation.en: Actually, it's not a white dot.
translation.it: Sapete, non è un punto bianco.

translation.en: It's Kelp's friend the White Whale.
And up close, they're the size of a hundred elevator clouds.
translation.it: E da vicino, sono grosse come cento nubi ascensore.

translation.en: They're bigger now. They're getting closer.
translation.it: È più grande ora. Si sta avvicinando.

translation.en: if we're gonna make you underwater-ready in time.
There, I'm ready to get underwater-ready.
-What's next? -I teach you how to swim.
This is teaching him how to swim?
Yep. In the water, if he kicks his legs like this,
translation.it: Sì. In acqua, se scalcia così con le zampe,

translation.en: Ollie, if this is gonna work,
you have to actually go in the water.
But I, uh, just did my hooves.
translation.it: Ma ho appena lucidato gli zoccoli.

translation.en: Water isn't gonna ruin your hoof polish.
translation.it: L'acqua non ti rovinerà lo smalto.

translation.en: Come on, Ollie. Just take one step.
translation.it: Forza, Ollie. Fai solo un passo.

translation.en: That's it. Now the other hoof.
I did it. I'm in the water.
You've only got two hooves in the water.
You need your whole body in the water if you're gonna meet the White Dot.
translation.it: Devi essere completamente in acqua per conoscere il Punto Balena.

translation.en: -She means the White Whale. -Yeah, the White Whale Dot.
translation.it: - Intende la Balena Bianca. - Il Punto Balena Bianca.

translation.en: Keep going. One step at a time.
Now all you've gotta do is kick like we practiced.
translation.it: Ora devi solo scalciare come abbiamo fatto prima.

translation.en: I'm going to go underwater and meet the White Whale.
translation.it: Andrò sott'acqua a conoscere la Balena Bianca.
Il Punto Balena è più grosso ora.

translation.en: The next time I see you, this hoof will be the hoof
translation.it: Quando vi rivedrò, questo zoccolo avrà

translation.en: that's shaken the fin of the White Whale.
translation.it: stretto la pinna alla Balena Bianca.
- Ti metto la bolla in testa? - Sì.

translation.en: It'll feel a little different putting your head under the water.
translation.it: Sarà diverso, mettere la testa sott'acqua.

translation.en: But you've never taken a bubble that was around a unicorn's head.
translation.it: Sì, ma mai una attorno alla testa di un unicorno.
- No! - La tua scintilla è da sempre speciale.

translation.en: We don't know what it can and can't do.
translation.it: Non sappiamo cosa possa fare o no.

translation.en: Not even the grown-up unicorns understand the spark behind your head bubble.
translation.it: Nemmeno gli unicorni adulti capiscono la tua bolla in testa.

translation.en: Don't worry, Ollie. We can still find a way.
translation.it: Non temere, Ollie. Troveremo il modo.

translation.en: There you are. We've been looking everywhere.
They're almost here. You don't wanna miss the White Whale, do you?
translation.it: È quasi arrivata. Non vorrai perderti la Balena Bianca!

translation.en: It's okay, Kelp. You need to go. I don't want you to miss out.
translation.it: Fa niente, Kelp. Vai. Non voglio che te la perda.

translation.en: But if I have your head bubble, what will you do?
translation.it: Ma se io ho la tua bolla, tu cosa farai?

translation.en: Tell the White Whale I'll see them next year.
translation.it: Dì alla Balena che la vedrò l'anno prossimo.

translation.en: Someone's gotta come already, or we'll all miss them.
translation.it: Che qualcuno venga, o ce la perderemo tutti.

translation.en: Ollie's coming. Take care of him, will you?
It's okay, Ollie. We've got you.
I can't wait for you to meet all my friends.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora che tu conosca i miei amici.

translation.en: We've gotta make sure my head bubble works on you.
Hi, Theo. This is my friend Ollie.
translation.it: Ciao, Theo. Ecco a voi Ollie.

translation.en: Oh, Mom, Dad, look who I brought.
translation.it: Oh, mamma, papà, guardate chi ho portato.

translation.en: This is Ollie. He's a unicorn like Kelp.
Why, hello, Ollie. We've heard a lot about you.
translation.it: Ehilà, Ollie. Abbiamo sentito tanto di te.

translation.en: Kelp's told me so much about his family.
translation.it: Kelp mi ha parlato tanto di voi.

translation.en: I'm so happy to finally meet you.
Why not? He loves the White Whale.
translation.it: Perché? Lui adora la Balena Bianca.

translation.en: He's up with Pixie and Juniper.
There was only one of these bubble thingies.
translation.it: C'era solo una di queste bolle.

translation.en: And it's Ollie's dream to meet the White Whale and shake their fin.
translation.it: E Ollie sogna di conoscere la Balena Bianca e stringerle la pinna.

translation.en: Kelp made my dream come true.
translation.it: Kelp ha avverato un mio sogno.

translation.en: They really are the size of a hundred elevator clouds.
translation.it: Sono davvero come cento nubi ascensore!
Grazie per la visita, Balena Bianca.
